audioText: Cette startup n'a pas la moindre chance de réussir dans ce marché très compétitif.
question: What does the sentence say about the startup's chances?
options: It doesn't have the slightest chance of succeeding in this very competitive market
It has excellent chances of succeeding in this competitive market
It has some chance of succeeding if the market changes
It will definitely succeed despite the competitive market
explanation: The sentence says 'Cette startup n'a pas la moindre chance de réussir dans ce marché très compétitif' - This startup doesn't have the slightest chance of succeeding in this very competitive market. 'Moindre' means slightest/least, emphasizing complete lack of chance.
